summary: A simple mod that will add Dragonborn Enemies in the world of Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][color=red][b]*LATEST NEWS FROM THE AUTHOR*

[/b][/color][b][color=#ffff00]**(NEW UPDATE 2017 Dragonborn Enemies v.02)**[/color]
[/b][/size][b]
[/b][color=#ffff00][size=4][b]I'm sorry that it took time(YEARS!) to update this mod I'm very busy with a lot stuffs and playing other games but here it is. its not the great update that you expect but still another challenge to face[/b].[/size][/color]

[color=#ffff00][i]v.02 Update Release of Dragonborn Millet.[/i][/color]

[color=#d0e0e3][size=3]Dragonborn Millet is another Dragonborn Enemy in the world of Skyrim that uses arcane arts as her arsenal. She is found in most Dragon Lairs in Skyrim and usually alongside with Dragonborn Helrato so thread lightly when you go on a Dragonlair-hunt(bring your best followers I suggest) and yes when you defeat her you can also absorb her dragonsoul[/size]
[/color][i]
[color=#ffff00]Details of Dragonborn Millet.
[/color][/i]
- Destruction High Skill Mastery
- Conjuration High Skill Mastery (Twin Soul Perk)
- Alteration Skill

[color=#ffff00]- Dragon Shouts -[/color] Frost Breath Shout, Dragon Aspect Shout, Ice Form Shout, Unrelenting Force Shout

[color=#ffff00]- Conjuration -[/color]Twin Soul Perk, Dragon Priest (Careful on this one, it can summon another Storm Atronach at its disposal)

[color=#ffff00]- Encounter Level -[/color] Any Level (but I suggest to take them on if your level is higher than 25)
[color=#ffff00]
- Encounter Map -[/color] Most Dragon Lairs alongside with Dragonborn Helrato and just outside Heljarchen Hall (your house in the Pale)

[color=#00ff00]*******[/color][color=#00ff00]*********************[/color]
[color=#ffff00][size=3][i]If you have any suggestions and ideas feel free to message me here or message me on my YouTube account
(just copy the link belowÂ the video and made a comment on my video for Dragonborn Enemies)
[/i][/size][/color]
[color=#00ff00]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/49667-1-1389176765.png[/img]

[/color] [color=#00ff00] ****************************[/color]

This Mod is my first created mod, so I decided to put it here and well it's a simple mod that put an additional dragonborn enemy(s) in the world of Skyrim.

Like Miraak that can use the Thu'um to eradicate his foes, here I put an enemy that can use the Thu'um as well as the Dovahkiin.

**Here is the details of Dragon Enemy(s) that you will encounter in the game*

*Dragonborn Enemy(s)*

**Dragonborn Helrato**
-One-Hand Skill Mastery (Sword Enchanted with Shock)
-Bow User (Bow Enchanted with Fire)
-Shield Skill Mastery (Resist Magic 30%)

- Dragon Shouts : Fire Breath Shout, Frost Breath Shout, Dragon Aspect Shout, Unrelenting Force Shout, Soul Tear Shout, Ice Form Shout,

- Dragon Shouts Cooldown of Helrato are reduced by 30%

- Encounter level : Any Level

- Encounter Map : near ANY DRAGON Lairs

[color=#00ff00]********************* VIDEO ******************************************[/color]
[color=#ffff00][size=3]
[youtube]FOj1a9t-ai4[/youtube]
[/size][/color]

[color=red][b][size=2]Video not appearing? here is the link:[/size][/b][/color] https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FOj1a9t-ai4

[color=#00ff00]********************** REQUIREMENTS ************************[/color]

-Skyrim DLC are required (Dawnguard, Hearthfire, Dragonborn)

-SKYRIM 1.9 or higher

[color=#00ff00][size=3]****************** INSTALLATION ***************************[/size][/color]

- Just Extract it in your Skyrim/Data folder

- Arrangement of this Mod: Any place will do.

*****************************************************************
author: ME - Brad Elvin
